original: Christoffersson, Carl Emanuel, distriktslantmätare, Norrköping, f. 25/1/ 84 i Landskrona av köpm. Nils C. o. Mathilda Svensson. G. 10 m. Linnéa Sandberg. Barn: Lennart f. 14, Bertil 18. — Mog:ex. 02, lantmät lauskult. 06. Distr :lantmät. i Norrköp. n. distr. sed. 20. Bitr. sekr. i 17 års lantmät:-komm. 18, sekr. där 19-20, v. ordf. i Sv:es ilantmät rfören. 34-45, ordf. i Sv:es d|str :lantmät ifören. 39-46, led. av styr. f. o. skattmäst. i Norrköp. konstgilk sed. 34. RVO.
translated: Christoffersson, Carl Emanuel, district surveyor, Norrköping, born January 25, 1884 in Landskrona, son of merchant Nils C. and Mathilda Svensson. Married to Linnéa Sandberg in 19xx. Children: Lennart born in 1914 and Bertil born in 1918. Graduated from college in 1902 and from the Surveying and Mapping School in 1906. District surveyor in Norrköping since 1920. Assistant secretary in the Surveying Committee for 17 years starting in 1918, secretary from 1919-1920, vice president of the Swedish Surveyor Association from 1934-1945, chairman of the Swedish District Surveyor Association from 1939-1946, and member of the board of the Art Guild and Taxmaster in Norrköping since 1934. Received the honor of the Royal Victorian Order.
